easyStandard.skull: -1 (-3 instead if you are at a _Graveyard_ location).
easyStandard.cultist: Reveal another token. If you fail and The Unnamable is in play, it attacks you (regardless of its current location).
easyStandard.tablet: +2. The black cat causes a distraction. If this test is successful, choose and evade an enemy at any location with a fight value of X or lower, where X is the amount you succeeded by.
easyStandard.elderThing: -2. If you fail, you must either place 1 of your clues on your location or take 1 damage.

hardExpert.skull: -2 (-4 instead if you are at a _Graveyard_ location).
hardExpert.cultist: Reveal another token. If you fail and The Unnamable is in play, it attacks you (regardless of its current location).
hardExpert.tablet: +1. The black cat causes a distraction. If this test is successful, choose and evade an enemy at any location with a fight value of X or lower, where X is the amount you succeeded by.
hardExpert.elderThing: -3. If you fail, you must either place 1 of your clues on your location or take 1 damage.
